0011000101101100 1000110110010010 1 -> sum: 1011111011111111, cout: 0

1100111011110110 1110001011110110 0 -> sum: 1011000111101100, cout: 1

0111010001011001 1000010000010111 0 -> sum: 1111100001110000, cout: 0
0010100010011011 1110111001011001 1 -> sum: 0001011011110101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
